name: Little Tactical Dungeon
description:
Use the three heros through the four first rooms to slay the first boss of the Little Tactical Dungeon.

There is no progression of the heros, and no randomness in damage/heal. So it's up to you to make your team survive against the ennemies.

For now, the game is pretty easy apart perhaps for the last boss.

This game protype was made for the minimalistic_jam with a restriction of 3 color per sprite (2 per background) and 15 color total.
